intro: Gymnanthes borneensis, commonly known as the Bornean gymnanthes, is a tropical plant native to Borneo. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, palmate leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Gymnanthes borneensis is often found in lowland rainforests and is adapted to high humidity and warm climates. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
